text: Christo's Valley Curtain is a 1974 American short documentary film directed by Albert and David Maysles, about Christo and Jeanne-Claude's Valley Curtain project. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.Documentary Winners: 1974 Oscars ==References== ==External links== *Christo’s Valley Curtain at Maysles Films * *The Screen: 'Christo's Valley Curtain' Is a Real Tall Story-New York Times review by Vincent Canby Category:1974 films Category:1970s short documentary films Category:American films Category:American short documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Documentary films about visual artists Category:Films directed by Albert and David Maysles Category:Films set in Colorado Category:Films shot in Colorado Category:Documentary films about Colorado
title: Christo's Valley Curtain
